ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Quad-band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 frequencies and GPRS/EDGE capabilities
2-megapixel camera with QCIF video capture; digital audio player; 128 MB internal memory (no expansion)
Bluetooth stereo music; access to personal email; web browser; SMS/MMS messaging; instant messaging
Up to 3.7 hours of talk time, up to 240 hours (10 days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: Nokia 8600 Unlocked Phone (Black)
